item.description:
Following the discussion today, we will have a potluck from 5:00-7:00.

For the potluck, Jeff and I will make some grilled chicken, shrimp, and portobello mushrooms, and provide drinks. Please bring a side dish or dessert to share.


There was some talk about going out folk dancing after the potluck. Here is information about the group Always on Sunday that has folk dancing every Sunday in West Hartford. On June 6th, they will have live music so it will probably cost $12 each.

Masonic Lodge, 11 South Main Street, West Hartford, CT. 7:00 - 10:00.

Get more information at http://www.alwaysonsu....

group.name: Connecticut A Course In Miracles Study Group

item.name: ACIM Discussion and Potluck
